agents.name: Uni Helper
agents.one_liner: Answers fees, Moodle, notes, eforms, and contacts.

commands.reply: 1) Open https://portal.univ.example 2) Login with student ID 3) Click Financial Services → Pay Online
Moodle: https://moodle.univ.example. Click Log in → University account.
Type: /notes COURSE_CODE (e.g., /notes CS201). Then you get the drive link.

agents.notes: Upload Drive links later in dashboard.

agents.name: Class Finder
agents.one_liner: Tells students where classes are and posts cancellations.

commands.reply: Type: where is <CLASS_CODE> (e.g., where is EE3210).
Professors can mark class cancelled in the admin panel.

agents.notes: Professors will be able to edit locations in Phase 2.

agents.name: Admin Assistant
agents.one_liner: Helps with forms, contact emails, and simple campus FAQs.

commands.reply: Student e-forms: https://portal.univ.example/forms. Choose form → fill → submit.

agents.notes: Good for admin or front-desk use.
